attributes.action: Increase pay for NHS nurses and auxiliary staff
attributes.additional_details: I am petitioning to Parliament as a part of my GCSE citizenship taking action project to discuss the NHS wage “crisis” in the UK. I have chosen this topic due to a plethora of reasons regarding its direct impact on my family and I and its wider influence upon our nation.
attributes.background: I believe a positive change in my topic would greatly benefit our society both local and nationally for the workers and those in care. Me and my project would greatly benefit from hearing your perspective on this matter. Thank you for your time and patience.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign these petitions which call for a similar action:  

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/629933

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630102

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/630032
